metadata.dc:author: Méndez-Santillán, E
metadata.dc:description: Striated lichen is a rare disease seen primarily in pediatric ages. Of more of less quick appearance, generally persisting for a year, and later spontaneously involuting. Its etiology and pathogenia are unkown. It is a disease essentially clinically diagnosed and should be differentiated from other entities of linear distribution.
metadata.dc:title: Liquen estriado.
[Striated lichen].
metadata.dc:publisher: Boletin medico del Hospital Infantil de Mexico
